name: phi-base
title: Pathogen-Host Interaction Database
description:
The pathogen-host interaction database (PHI-base) is an online database that catalogues experimentally-verified pathogenicity, virulence and effector genes from bacterial, fungal and oomycete pathogens, which infect human, animal, plant, insect, fish and fungal hosts. Plant endophytes are also included.

PHI-base aims to aid the discovery of genes in pathogens that are medically and agronomically important, and that may be potential targets for chemical intervention. Information in PHI-base is manually curated by expert curators from peer-reviewed publications. The database is freely accessible to both academic and non-academic users.
